content: p aige baby do ll | 1 paige babydoll yarn requirements 10ply/worsted weight yarn main colour and contrast by rachel evans colour the paige babydoll is a some suggested yarns sister pattern to the kaia o bendigo woollen mills luxury 10ply babydoll it is a simple o 100purewool 3ply yet gorgeous babydoll o gaia worsted o brown sheep cotton fleece top there are two skirt o tig springvale super merino options a full skirt with o jo sharp desert garden aran cotton two hems to choose from or an a-line cabled gauge/gauge skirt 20st/10cm 5st/1 you will need 4 5mm circular needle or size to achieve correct this top is a seamless top gauge 30 40 and 60 cm down garment knit in 4mm circular needle 40 or 60cm depending on the round on circular size needles it can be 5mm circular needle for full skirt option 40 and knitted in wool for 60cm spring/autumn and approx 1 1 5m ribbon/i-cord/crochet chain winter or in cotton for 5 stitch markers summer both plain and cable needle variegated yarns are well suited to the pattern ©button & bean designs 2010 p aige baby do ll | 2 yarn meterage required approx abbreviations this chart gives the approximate meterage required to knit the paige babydoll as always when knitting it is a good idea to have some yarn co cast off in reserve just in case mc- main colour yarn cc -
